nav.div: East Newton School District » News » What's New » COVID-19 Information & Resources

img.span: Information on this page will be updated regularly.

br.strong: The Student Meal Form for the week of APRIL 27th will be posted on Friday

a.title: Deparement of Social Services Food Assistance

br.span: *Please click on link below and select a campus

strong.span: East Newton School District - Educational Resources

p.span: Granby Telephone Company has graciously provided hotspots at East Newton High School (north parking lot) and at the Granby Telephone Company Parking lot.

While our buildings are still closed, these WIFI hotspot can be accessed with a phone, tablet, or laptop in the north parking lot of the high school, or in the GTC parking lot. While accessing the internet you will still need to remain in your car maintaining social distancing. This WIFI hotspot will still have the similar filters that the school uses to maintain internet safety. Each student should follow the same usage rules as apply at school. The hotspot will have the designation GTC Student Hotspot.
The hotspot at the high school will be available Monday through Friday from 7:00am to 1:00pm.

br.span: As of now, the closure should not affect the commencement date. As far as what commencement looks like, we will have to wait and see the status of COVID-19 and take into account official instruction, should there be any at that time.
All state testing for Missouri schools has been canceled by DESE.

span.strong: Will Thursday night's board meeting still be in session?

br.span: Yes, we will still have the board meeting on Thursday, April 23, 2020. No public will be allowed. The video will be recorded and a link will be posted on the district website to view the meeting.

span.strong: Will athletic practices and games for this week be cancelled?

br.span: There will be no activities (practices, games, etc) through April 24th. This will be continually evaluated going forward from that date.

span.strong: Will missed days need to be made up?

br.span: DESE has waived all missed days so there will be no make up days.

span.strong: I had an appointment with PAT for a screening. Is it cancelled?

br.span: All kindergarten and preschool screening appointments for March 16 through March 21 are cancelled. When school is back in session, please call the PAT office to reschedule your appointment.

span.strong: Will the school still provide breakfast and lunch?

br.span: Beginning April 1st the school will provide a supper meal to go along with the breakfast and lunch meals. These are to be picked up at Granby Elementary & JH and Triway Elementary & JH. There will be a form on the website that needs to be filled out or you can call central office at (417) 472-6232

strong.span: Do I have to pick up meals at the school my student(s) attend?

br.span: No, you can pick up at either location. Please indicate your pickup location when filling out the form on the district website or when you call in

div.div: 22808 East Highway 86, Granby, MO 64844 | Phone 417.472.6231 | Fax 417.472.3500
